response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our clients' needs and providing them with the best possible solutions. Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This is a significant discount from its original value, making it an excellent investment for you. We are confident that you will find immense value in this product, just like many others have before. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1300000}
